conversation.content:
f2051b5bea31476c8394e6f34:
  'Name': Stretch Breaks
  'Skill Description': Employee needs information on the importance of taking regular
    stretch breaks.
  'Entity':
    857f5e0fc5e049118ba968300:
      'Name': stretch_type
      'Description': The type of stretch break exercise to perform.
    3910176e8b704184ba31c59df:
      'Name': duration
      'Description': The length of time for a stretch break.
    55887b609fb641dabe7db6795:
      'Name': frequency
      'Description': How often an employee should take stretch breaks.
38aac7a893df4ea38dc6fff0b:
  'Name': Ergonomic Training
  'Skill Description': Employee is interested in receiving ergonomic training provided
    by the company.
  'Entity':
    e844d4cd44234c91bb42b2598:
      'Name': training_type
      'Description': The type of ergonomic training the employee is interested
        in.
    1e49d09024a04772b6fc1e097:
      'Name': department
      'Description': The department that the employee belongs to.
    55343e4dc9b845f393a848797:
      'Name': level
      'Description': The level of ergonomic training that the employee needs.
    7fd76642104842ac91ffe8eb5:
      'Name': training_provider
      'Description': The company or organization that will provide the ergonomic
        training.
      'Similar values':
      - Company A
      - Company B
      - Company C
      - Company D
e2f7c796b08142e4a4a346087:
  'Name': Mouse Placement
  'Skill Description': Employee wants to know the best placement for their mouse
    to avoid strain.
  'Entity':
    d7c2ccde128347039bf7f2ede:
      'Name': mouse_type
      'Description': The type of mouse used by the employee.
      'Similar values':
      - optical mouse
      - trackball mouse
      - vertical mouse
    05786c34af22431f9f9839bd3:
      'Name': hand_dominance
      'Description': The dominant hand of the employee.
      'Restriction': Must be from the set {right, left, both}
    674ebed3ac9b43719906fa3c5:
      'Name': desk_height
      'Description': The height of the employee's desk.
      'Restriction': Only extract if height is given in inches. 
5a2bce8dca3f4d58a07376b3f:
  'Name': N/A
  'Skill Description': The utterance does not match any skills
